about_the_game:
19th Century, Somewhere Lost in the Depths of Europe

Lost and confused, you wake up in the middle of nowhere. In your memory, all light is shattered... only the burning recollection of a woman's red lips and the shame of the cowards remains. Is this the reward for the sins of your past, or are you just a poor fool in the wrong place at the wrong time?

Survival Horror Experience

Immerse yourself in a chilling first-person survival horror game. Solve intriguing puzzles and explore the dark, gothic settings of Ardeal. Arm yourself with axes, revolvers, or carbines to survive in a hostile environment where supernatural creatures lurk around every corner.

Solve Puzzles

Face intricate puzzles, alternating the style of escape room and survival horror games. Never forget to look around; you never know what might be lurking in the shadows.

Unravel the Mystery of the Crimson Apostle

Solve puzzles, find secrets, and collect the necessary items to survive the trials before you. Pursued by an ever-growing darkness, your despair grows as you realize your unbridled ambition may have started a chain of events that threaten to engulf the world in darkness... Will the world see the next dawn?

"Listen to them, the children of the night! What music they make!" - Bram Stoker

Main Features:

  • Immersive Gothic Atmosphere: Experience the mysterious and atmospheric world of Ardeal, filled with dark forests, ancient ruins, and eerie castles.

  • Survival Horror Experience: Inspired by the new generation of Resident Evil, navigate a dark world where every decision is a matter of life and death.

  • Challenging Puzzles: Solve intricate puzzles that test your wits and courage.

  • Weapon and Resource Management: Use limited weapons and resources to survive the nightmare world of Crimson Apostle.

  • Realistic Graphics: Inspired by Victorian and gothic aesthetics.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Crimson Apostle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 BIT)
  • Processor: i5-4460, 2,70 Ghz or AMD FX-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or AMD Radeon™ RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/30FPS. May require reduction in Texture Quality settings and other settings adjustment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS

short_description: Crimson Apostle is a first-person horror game inspired by the new generation of Resident Evil. Set in the gothic region of Ardeal in the 19th century, survive macabre challenges from your ethereal pursuer and face lurking creatures.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
